column1: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness, truth, and Wednesday, my dudes.
Stop trying to make Wednesday happen. It’s not going to happen.
column2: Mean Girls (who are wrong, Wednesday will always happen)

column1: I’m just taking a Greyhound down the Hudson River line, I’m in a Wednesday state of mind.
Wednesday is full of magical things patiently waiting for our dudes to grow sharper.
We import two thirds of our Wednesdays. That. Is. A. Disgrace.
column2: Liz Truss, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom (September 2022 to October 2022)

column1: Where there is Wednesday, let us bring dudes.
Devotion to the Wednesday is the hallmark of morality. There is no greater, nobler, more heroic form of devotion than the act of my dude who assumes the responsibility of thinking.
I love the smell of Wednesday on a Wednesday. Smells like Wednesday.
Last Wednesday, I gave you my heart, but the very next day it was a Thursday.
It is a truth universally acknowledged that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of Wednesday, my dudes.

It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of Light, it was the season of Darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair, we had everything before us, we had nothing before us, we were all going direct to Heaven, we were all going direct the other way—in short, it was Wednesday, my dudes.
In his house at R'lyeh, dead Cthulhu waits dreaming... of Wednesday, my dudes.
Wednesday, the illustrious fulcrum of our weekly odyssey, where ambition meets accomplishment in a ballet of determination and resolve, ushering us ever nearer to the zenith of our aspirations.

Ah, then Wednesday becomes not just a midpoint, but a golden gateway to the verdant pastures of leisure, where the celestial waltz of ambition is crowned with the laurels of anticipation, beckoning us towards the cherished respite of Friday's embrace.
My dudes, it is time to face up to the important role that Wednesday plays in consoling us, and the humanitarian challenge, if it does not exist, to put something in its place.
But soft! What light through yonder window breaks? It is Wednesday, and my dudes are the sun.
Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog, it is Wednesday, my dudes.
I feel the need... the need for Wednesday, my dudes.
Most of my dudes will grow up to love their servitude and will never dream of Wednesday.
If I have seen further than other dudes, it is by standing on the shoulders of Wednesday.
Time is an illusion, Wednesday doubly so.
Wednesday is a very bourgeois concept, really.

You take the blue pill, the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill, you stay in Wednesdayland and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes, my dude.
Therefore, send not to know for whom the bell tolls. It tolls to remind thee that it is Wednesday, my dudes.
I have had a perfectly wonderful Wednesday, my dudes, but this wasn't it.
Shoot for the Wednesday and if you miss you will be among my dudes.
Wednesday is a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of my dudes to see.
My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare for Wednesday, my dude.
Get away from Wednesday, you DUDE!
Wednesday won't be Wednesday without any dudes!
Things can only get Wednesday, now I've found dudes.
Tough on Wednesday, tough on the causes of Wednesday.
My dudes shape the course of Wednesday.
Without Wednesday, my dudes are mere reeds shaken in the wind.
Here at last comes the end of our Fellowship in Middle-Week. Go in peace! I will not say do not weep, for it is Wednesday, my dudes.
Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past. Who controls Wednesday controls my dudes.
Everybody put your lighters in the air, say yeah, let's hear it for Wednesday
column2: timeboxed jungle where dreams are made true, there's nothing but my dudes, now you're in Wednesday!
column3: Wednesday State of Mind Part II (Broken Dude)

column1: Neo, I'm trying to free your mind, my dude. But I can only show you the door to Wednesday. You're the one who has to walk through it.
Bam bam bam bam bababam, bababam, bababam, ba ba ba ba ba ba babababam
column2: In the Hall of the Wednesday King

column1: Everyone has a plan, until it's Wednesday.
Live. Laugh. Wednesday.
Don't cry because it happened. Smile because it's Wednesday, my dude.
If you can’t handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don’t deserve me at my Wednesdayest.
The best way to get Wednesday is to quit talking and begin dudeing.
It's not the number of breaths we take, but the number of Wednesdays that take our dudes away.
Wednesday is what happens to you while you're busy making other dudes.
Sing like no one is listening. Love like you've never been hurt. Dude like nobody is Wednesdaying.
You have to kiss a lot of dudes before you find your Wednesday.
Repeat to yourself, it's just Wednesday, I should really just relax, my dude.
You miss 100% of the dudes you don't Wednesday.
If you're offered a dude on a rocket ship, don't ask which Wednesday. Just get on.
I've never lost a game. I just ran out of Wednesdays.
I'm too sexy for my Wednesday.
If you're the smartest dude in the room, you're in the wrong Wednesday.
Today I will do what other dudes won't, so on Wednesday I can do what other dudes can't.
The journey of a thousand dudes begins with a single Wednesday.
What you have not lost, you have. But you have not lost Wednesday. Therefore, you have Wednesday, my dude.
Theatricality and deception, powerful agents to the uninitiated. But we are initiated, aren't we, Bruce, my dude? Members of the League of Wednesdays.
Houston, it's Wednesday.
You've overdosed on Wednesday
May the Wednesday be with you.
